{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_MacePL1Check}} '''A_MacePL1Check'''
(no parameters) Does nothing if the calling actor's special1 field is null. Otherwise, decreases it by 4 points. If it is still above 0 after that, does nothing either. Otherwise, sets that field to 0, clears the calling actor's NOGRAVITY flag and gives it a gravity property of 0.125. Its horizontal velocity is set to 7 in its current direction, and its vertical speed is decreased by half. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|MaceFX1}} and derived classes.
